response.original_title: Lahna Turner: I Wrote A Song About It
response.overview: Lahna Turner brings her stand-up to Las Vegas for her first hour-long comedy special. With her sharp wit and hilarious songs, this audacious comedian holds nothing back as she shares insights and observations from her life as a wife, mother, and the uncensored inner voice of millions of women.
response.title: Lahna Turner: I Wrote A Song About It
